title: Kinda sad...
body:
Nowadays I feel like it's so rare to see any real variety of champions on the Rift, it's always a small amount of FotM champions that keep getting played, regardless of how well they do. For examples you see people always playing champions like Darius top, Lee Sin jungle, Jhin/Jinx ADC, Thresh support.
It's been a while since I've seen champions like Sejuani, Olaf, Rumble or Volibear in games nowadays.

Like I know about metashifts and whatnot but it's just kinda sad that they're not seen anymore.

replies.body: Can't remember the last time I've seen a volibear

I just had a game with volibear in it, stupid ass bear kept shutting me down with his frenzy, and earlier i had a sejuani, stupid pig freezing hell incarnate wihth her damn skill shots, olaf i saw earlier as well, he got his ass kicked by a Soraka, it was hilarious. Rumble was banned like 3 times in my last 20 games, and played in 1 or 2, annoying ult dealing dot after ge dies...
,dunno what you're on about, i've seen people playing tristana, rumble, tahm kench, and kassadin this week alone.
Tristana and Kench are okay, but yeah Rumble and Kass are rare, lucky you man
just saw 2 malz and 2 kass out of 10 games yesterday
Kass I feel is rare, Malz is quite FotM right now so he's real common

Within every season and every patch there is a rotation of champions that are stronger than others. This is what we consider the meta. If you play long enough, you will notice this. 

But yes, it is quite sad that there are only a select few champions that are popular because they are strong, and the big rotations take months.
I said I know what metashifts are

I see {{champion:268}} almost every game, but that's just because I'm playing him.


Anyway, now you only have to learn to perfectly counter like 10 champions and you win.
